Zhen Liu (刘 震)

Email: liuzhen03@megvii.com

Web: https://liuzhen03.github.io

Biography

Zhen Liu received his B.S. and M.S. degrees from the School of Computer Science at Sichuan University in 2018 and 2021, supervised by Prof. Jiancheng Lv. Now he is a full time researcher in MEGVII Research, supervised by Prof. Shuaicheng Liu. His research interests include Computer Vision and Computer Graphics.

Projects

High Dynamic Range Imaging

May. 2020 - Present

Multi-frame high dynamic range (HDR) imaging aims to generate images with a wider dynamic range and more realistic details by merging several low dynamic range (LDR) images with varying exposures.

Online Video Stabilization

Nov. 2021 - Apr. 2022

Video stabilization is one of the most fundamental and challenging tasks in video processing and can be used in many applications, such as video surveillance, robotics, unmanned vehicles and smartphones. Video stabilization is a video enhancement technique that aims to improve original video quality by eliminating potentially shaky camera motion.
